name: Myocardial infarction
info: one or more definite or probable myocardial infarctions, had been hospitalised and had EKG and or enzyme changes

name: CHF
info: exertional or paroxysmal nocturnal dyspnea and has responded to digitalis, diuretics, or afterload reducing agents

name: Peripheral vascular disease
info: Intermittent claudication or past bypass for chronic arterial insufficiency, history of gangrene or acute arterial insufficiency, or untreated thoracic or abdominal aneurysm (â‰¥6 cm)

name: CVA or TIA
info: History of a cerebrovascular accident with minor or no residua and transient ischemic attacks

name: Peptic ulcer disease
info: Any history of treatment for ulcer disease or history of ulcer bleeding

name: Liver disease
info: Severe = cirrhosis and portal hypertension with variceal bleeding history, moderate = cirrhosis and portal hypertension but no variceal bleeding history, mild = chronic hepatitis (or cirrhosis without portal hypertension)

name: Moderate to severe CKG
info: Severe = on dialysis, status post kidney transplant, uremia, moderate = creatinine >3 mg/dL (0.27 mmol/L)
